definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: A water-base drilling fluid that contains dispersed oil or synthetic hydrocarbon as an internal phase.
sentences.chinese: 分散的油滴或合成烴爲內相的水基鑽井液。

sentences.english: The new water-based mold coating for resin-bonded sand mold and core for aluminium castings has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 爲鋁鑄件樹脂砂型芯研製出新型的水基淺色塗料。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基納米金剛石拋光液可能是未來拋光液的發展方向。

sentences.english: To clean an instrument, use a damp cloth or mild, water based cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 請用溼布或柔和的水基清潔劑清潔儀器。

sentences.english: The thickeners are the main additives of water-base fracturing liquids.
sentences.chinese: 增稠劑是用於水基壓裂液的最主要添加劑。

sentences.english: Water-based magnetic fluids dispersed by polyvinyl alcohol(PVA) were prepared by chemical coprecipitation.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學共沉澱法製備了聚乙烯醇分散水基磁流體。

sentences.english: The preparation method of ceramic membrane substrate by tape casting technique using aqueous slurries containing latex binder was studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用水基裝體流延成型法制備陶瓷膜基體。

sentences.english: The main performance index of HWB hydraulic medium is far from that of the oil.
sentences.chinese: 高水基液壓介質與油相比，其主要性能指標相差甚遠。

sentences.english: Use of all water-based environmentally cleaning process.
sentences.chinese: 採用全水基環保清洗工藝。

sentences.english: We've changed the lubricant to a slippery substance that's not water-based.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們已經把它換成了一種非水基的潤滑物質。

sentences.english: Strength of cold-box core will obviously decrease by water-based coating.
sentences.chinese: 冷芯盒法砂芯浸塗水基塗料後強度會明顯下降。

sentences.english: Adopt the environmentally water-based protection, aqua pura ultrasonic cleaning process.
sentences.chinese: 採用水基環保，純水超聲清洗工藝。

sentences.english: The dripping property of water based coating with big thixotropy is better.
sentences.chinese: 觸變性大的水基塗料滴淌性能好。

sentences.english: Test results showed that better voltage-controlled friction performance could be obtained for this aqueous cutting liquid.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明該水基切削液具有較好的電控摩擦性能。

sentences.english: This water-based industrial washing machine washes, rinses, and dries small to medium size parts.
sentences.chinese: 這種水基工業洗滌器洗滌，漂洗，烘乾中小型零部件。
